question: Consider the following statements with regard to recent Climate Change Performance Index (CCPI) 1.Sweden is the best performing country. 2.Sri Lanka is on the second place due to the connection of the world’s largest solar plant to the grid. 3.The bottom five in the list are Saudi Arabia, U.S., Iran, South Korea and Taiwan. Which of the following is true?
explanation: Morocco has been named the second best performing country after Sweden in the Climate Change Performance Index (CCPI).With the connection of the world’s largest solar plant to the grid, Morocco is on track for achieving its target of 42% installed renewable energy capacities by 2020.
